data.body: All's well that ends better
Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment, until it becomes a memory.
data.author: Dr. Suess

data.body: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
data.author: Sheryl Sandberg

data.body: Today you are you. That is truer than true. There is no one alive who is youer than you!
data.author: Dr. Suess

data.body: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
data.author: Confucius

data.body: Learn from the mistakes of others. You can't live long enough to make them all yourself
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.body: If you're walking down the right path and you're willing to keep walking, eventually you'll make progress.
data.author: Barack Obama

data.body: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.body: We can complain because rose bushes have thorns, or rejoice because thorn bushes have roses.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.body: Don’t compare yourself with anyone in this world… if you do so, you are insulting yourself.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.body: It’s fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.body: We got dreams and we got the right to chase ’em.
data.author: J Cole

data.body: To appreciate the sun, you gotta know what rain is.
data.author: J Cole

data.body: Dare to wear the foolish clown face.
data.author: Frank Sinatra

data.body: Grab your opportunity
data.author: Bruno Mars

data.body: You build on failure
data.author: Johnny Cash

data.body: Stop acting so small
data.author: Rumi

data.body: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
data.author: Rumi

data.body: Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames.
data.author: Rumi

data.body: These pains you feel are messengers. Listen to them.
data.author: Rumi

data.body: Don’t you know yet? It is your light that lights the worlds.
data.author: Rumi

data.body: In each moment the fire rages, it will burn away a hundred veils. And carry you a thousand steps toward your goal.
data.author: Rumi

data.body: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one’s ignorance.
data.author: Confucius

data.body: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you, not by angels or by demons, heaven or hell.
data.author: Buddha

data.body: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.body: Gratitude for the present moment and the fullness of life now is the true prosperity.
data.author: Eckhart Tolle

data.body: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.body: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.body: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
data.author: Charles Dickens

data.body: A thankful heart is not only the greatest virtue, but the parent of all the other virtues.
data.author: Cicero

data.body: Study without desire spoils the memory, and it retains nothing that it takes in.
data.author: Leonardo da Vinci

data.body: A man who carries a cat by the tail learns something he can learn in no other way.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.body: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.body: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go
data.author: Dr. Suess

data.body: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
data.author: Abigail Adams

data.body: Play by the rules, but be ferocious.
data.author: Phil Knight

data.body: Business opportunities are like buses, there’s always another one coming.
data.author: Richard Branson

data.body: There’s no shortage of remarkable ideas, what’s missing is the will to execute them.
data.author: Seth Godin

data.body: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.body: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.body: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.body: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

data.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
data.author: Thomas Edison, type.fit

data.text: You can observe a lot just by watching.
data.author: Yogi Berra, type.fit

data.text: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln, type.fit

data.text: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, type.fit

data.text: Fate is in your hands and no one elses
data.author: Byron Pulsifer, type.fit

data.text: Be the chief but never the lord.
data.author: Lao Tzu, type.fit

data.text: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
data.author: Carl Sandburg, type.fit

data.text: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
data.author: Yogi Berra

data.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
data.author: Buddha, type.fit

data.text: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
data.author: Karen Clark, type.fit

data.text: You'll see it when you believe it.
data.author: Wayne Dyer, type.fit

data.text: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
data.author: type.fit
